TopicTitle: What kind of information you need if you want create aresopace company

Articles.Content:
You need be multibilionare for sure, but what kind of data you requere to fund such company.

I study library science, we have lecture about information economic, we need wirte short paper about it, we have to write about starting bussines(as we desire)

, Truck Compnay, book store, game devlepmnet company(like SQUAD for exemple ) and what data we need, cost of aquering such data and so on.

I want have my on own rocket company, so i maybe write something about what "information data" we need to start such company,

Edited January 7, 2015 by Pawelk198604

You would start it like any other company.

Of course, before you get started, you are going to need a business model, a potential market, and to hire the right people.

You also need a product that has some form of demand. Heck dont even need to be mulibillionare. I know an outfit that started up in some guys garage repairing landing gear on small aircraft, and now they build a few thousand sets a year for sale.

I must write paper about information economic, i must write from perspective selected by business, sport, aerospace, medicine, transport, stock market etc.

And state what kind of information is most important for that sector, i must write at least 5 pages.
